title: NetworkManagementClient
description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_List.title: The List VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections operation retrieves all the virtual network gateways connections created.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_List.description: The List VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections operation retrieves all the virtual network gateways connections created.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_Delete.title: Deletes the specified virtual network Gateway connection.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_Delete.description: Deletes the specified virtual network Gateway connection.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_Get.title: Gets the specified virtual network gateway connection by resource group.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_Get.description: Gets the specified virtual network gateway connection by resource group.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_UpdateT.title: Updates a virtual network gateway connection tags.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_UpdateT.description: Updates a virtual network gateway connection tags.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_CreateO.title: Creates or updates a virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_CreateO.description: Creates or updates a virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_GetShar.title: The Get VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation retrieves information about the specified virtual network gateway connection shared key through Network resource provider.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_GetShar.description: The Get VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation retrieves information about the specified virtual network gateway connection shared key through Network resource provider.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_SetShar.title: The Put VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation sets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_SetShar.description: The Put VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation sets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_ResetSh.title: The VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionResetSharedKey operation resets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.
VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections_ResetSh.description: The VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionResetSharedKey operation resets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

VirtualNetworkGateways_VpnDeviceConfigur.title: Gets a xml format representation for vpn device configuration script.
VirtualNetworkGateways_VpnDeviceConfigur.description: Gets a xml format representation for vpn device configuration script.

LocalNetworkGateways_List.title: Gets all the local network gateways in a resource group.
LocalNetworkGateways_List.description: Gets all the local network gateways in a resource group.

LocalNetworkGateways_Delete.title: Deletes the specified local network gateway.
LocalNetworkGateways_Delete.description: Deletes the specified local network gateway.

LocalNetworkGateways_Get.title: Gets the specified local network gateway in a resource group.
LocalNetworkGateways_Get.description: Gets the specified local network gateway in a resource group.

LocalNetworkGateways_UpdateTags.title: Updates a local network gateway tags.
LocalNetworkGateways_UpdateTags.description: Updates a local network gateway tags.

LocalNetworkGateways_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates or updates a local network gateway in the specified resource group.
LocalNetworkGateways_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates or updates a local network gateway in the specified resource group.

VirtualNetworkGateways_List.title: Gets all virtual network gateways by resource group.
VirtualNetworkGateways_List.description: Gets all virtual network gateways by resource group.

VirtualNetworkGateways_Delete.title: Deletes the specified virtual network gateway.
VirtualNetworkGateways_Delete.description: Deletes the specified virtual network gateway.

VirtualNetworkGateways_Get.title: Gets the specified virtual network gateway by resource group.
VirtualNetworkGateways_Get.description: Gets the specified virtual network gateway by resource group.

VirtualNetworkGateways_UpdateTags.title: Updates a virtual network gateway tags.
VirtualNetworkGateways_UpdateTags.description: Updates a virtual network gateway tags.

VirtualNetworkGateways_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates or updates a virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.
VirtualNetworkGateways_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates or updates a virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.

VirtualNetworkGateways_ListConnections.title: Gets all the connections in a virtual network gateway.
VirtualNetworkGateways_ListConnections.description: Gets all the connections in a virtual network gateway.

VirtualNetworkGateways_Generatevpnclient.title: Generates VPN client package for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.
VirtualNetworkGateways_Generatevpnclient.description: Generates VPN client package for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.

VirtualNetworkGateways_GenerateVpnProfil.title: Generates VPN profile for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group. Used for IKEV2 and radius based authentication.
VirtualNetworkGateways_GenerateVpnProfil.description: Generates VPN profile for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group. Used for IKEV2 and radius based authentication.

VirtualNetworkGateways_GetAdvertisedRout.title: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway is advertising to the specified peer.
VirtualNetworkGateways_GetAdvertisedRout.description: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway is advertising to the specified peer.

VirtualNetworkGateways_GetBgpPeerStatus.title: The GetBgpPeerStatus operation retrieves the status of all BGP peers.
VirtualNetworkGateways_GetBgpPeerStatus.description: The GetBgpPeerStatus operation retrieves the status of all BGP peers.

VirtualNetworkGateways_GetLearnedRoutes.title: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway has learned, including routes learned from BGP peers.
VirtualNetworkGateways_GetLearnedRoutes.description: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway has learned, including routes learned from BGP peers.

VirtualNetworkGateways_GetVpnclientIpsec.title: The Get VpnclientIpsecParameters operation retrieves information about the vpnclient ipsec policy for P2S client of virtual network gateway in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.
VirtualNetworkGateways_GetVpnclientIpsec.description: The Get VpnclientIpsecParameters operation retrieves information about the vpnclient ipsec policy for P2S client of virtual network gateway in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

VirtualNetworkGateways_GetVpnProfilePack.title: Gets pre-generated VPN profile for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group. The profile needs to be generated first using generateVpnProfile.
VirtualNetworkGateways_GetVpnProfilePack.description: Gets pre-generated VPN profile for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group. The profile needs to be generated first using generateVpnProfile.

VirtualNetworkGateways_Reset.title: Resets the primary of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.
VirtualNetworkGateways_Reset.description: Resets the primary of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.

VirtualNetworkGateways_ResetVpnClientSha.title: Resets the VPN client shared key of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.
VirtualNetworkGateways_ResetVpnClientSha.description: Resets the VPN client shared key of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.

VirtualNetworkGateways_SetVpnclientIpsec.title: The Set VpnclientIpsecParameters operation sets the vpnclient ipsec policy for P2S client of virtual network gateway in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.
VirtualNetworkGateways_SetVpnclientIpsec.description: The Set VpnclientIpsecParameters operation sets the vpnclient ipsec policy for P2S client of virtual network gateway in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

VirtualNetworkGateways_SupportedVpnDevic.title: Gets a xml format representation for supported vpn devices.
VirtualNetworkGateways_SupportedVpnDevic.description: Gets a xml format representation for supported vpn devices.
